entry.value: select min(batch_id), max(batch_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch where create_time < ? and status in ('OK','IG') and batch_id < (select max(batch_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch)

delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch where status in ('OK','IG') and batch_id between :MIN and :MAX and batch_id not in (select batch_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event where batch_id between :MIN and :MAX)

delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event where batch_id not in (select batch_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch where batch_id between :MIN and :MAX and status not in ('OK','IG')) and batch_id between :MIN and :MAX
delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event where batch_id=-1 and create_time < :CUTOFF_TIME
select min(data_id), max(data_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data where data_id < (select max(data_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data)
update $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch set status='OK' where node_id not in (select node_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_node where sync_enabled=1) and status != 'OK'

delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data where data_id between :MIN and :MAX and data_id < (select max(ref_data_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_ref) and create_time < :CUTOFF_TIME and data_id not in (select e.data_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event e where e.data_id between :MIN and :MAX)

delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data where data_id between :MIN and :MAX and create_time < :CUTOFF_TIME and data_id in (select e.data_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event e where e.data_id between :MIN and :MAX) and data_id not in (select e.data_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event e where e.data_id between :MIN and :MAX and (e.data_id is null or e.batch_id in (select batch_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_outgoing_batch where status not in ('OK','IG'))))
select node_id, min(batch_id), max(batch_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_incoming_batch where create_time < ? and status = 'OK' group by node_id
delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_incoming_batch where batch_id between ? and ? and node_id = ? and status = 'OK'
delete from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_gap where last_update_time < ? and status != 'GP'
